articles.content: The agate specimen was originally stored in the Natural History Museum's mineralogy collection, but researchers think the gem grew inside a 67 million-year-old titanosaur egg.  (Image credit: Trustee… [+4283 chars]

articles.author: Sharmila Kuthunur
articles.title: Delays to NASA's VERITAS mission a major blow for Venus exploration - Space.com
articles.description: Three long awaited Venus missions were synced by design, until they weren't.
articles.content: Delays to the first of three missions making the long awaited return to the scorching planet Venus, which scientists say has not had enough robotic visitors in the past decades, might affect the two … [+5039 chars]
